(Sorry, RFA, if I were to wait for you all night, my characters would be 
giving an open invitation for other Maximals to come and help, or let you 
three get away.  Sorry, I just can't do that, it would go against the 
attitude of my characters)

Imprisoner/Predator/Choran:



Imprisoner laughed at seeing Hot Rod go down, but yelled in pain as he 
blocked Savanna's claws with his left arm, sending a punch towards the 
Maximal's face.

Predator headed for Savanna, weapon raised.

Choran headed for Savanna as well, weapons raised.

"Surrender, Maximal!  Or you and your friends die!" Imprisoner yelled, 
laughing evilly, raising his weapon at her.
